answers.answer: Hi,Has this happened abruptly or is this something that has been observed gradually?Are there other associated symptoms like pain in urination?Any changes in urinary character and in bowel movement?Does your husband have underlying systemic disease like diabetes?Do keep us posted with your answers.

we have discovered this gradually when about 5 -6 times after having sex he had the same problem. by the way in past he had a stunt fit in his intestine coz it had gone narrow. he often gets peoblem urinating. he also takes very long in the toilet every morning.no diabetes has come up though.

question: My husband gets an annoying pain in his pennis n stomach mostly after having sex n sometimes else as well. he gets a strong feeling of urinating but can't pass it. he feels like his urine gets stuck n he has to wait n try again n again to get rid of the feeling. Pls Help!!
title: Help For husband
